SELECT C.CategoryID AS "CategoryID", MAX(C.CategoryName) AS "CategoryName", SUM(case when I.StoreItemID is null then 0 else 1 end) AS "FormsCnt" FROM jwf_store_formscategory C LEFT OUTER JOIN jwf_store_forms F ON F.CategoryID = C.CategoryID AND F.IsUse = 'Y'
AND F.FormName LIKE '%' || #{searchKeyword} || '%'
AND F.FormPrefix LIKE '%' || #{searchKeyword} || '%'
LEFT OUTER JOIN sys_store_items I ON F.StoreItemID =I.StoreItemID
AND I.IsFree = #{filterIsFree}
LEFT OUTER JOIN jwf_store_forms_rev R ON R.StoredFormRevID = F.StoredFormRevID WHERE C.IseUse = 'Y' GROUP BY C.CategoryID, C.seq ORDER BY C.seq

SELECT F.FormPrefix AS "FormPrefix", F.StoredFormID AS "StoredFormID", F.StoredFormRevID AS "StoredFormRevID", F.FormName AS "FormName", F.FormDescription AS "FormDescription", C.CategoryID AS "CategoryID", Fn_BaseGetDictionary_S(#{lang}, C.CategoryName) AS "CategoryName", I.StoreItemID AS "StoreItemID", I.IsFree AS "IsFree", I.Price AS "Price", F.FormDescription AS "FormDescription", R.FormHtmlFileID AS "FormHtmlFileID", R.FormJsFileID AS "FormJsFileID", R.MobileFormHtmlFileID AS "MobileFormHtmlFileID", R.MobileFormJsFileID AS "MobileFormJsFileID", R.ThumbnailFileID AS "ThumbnailFileID", R.RevisionNo AS "RevisionNo", F.PurchasedCnt AS "PurchasedCnt", CASE WHEN P.StoredFormRevID IS NULL THEN 'N' ELSE 'Y' END AS "PurchaseYN", P.PurchaseDate AS "PurchaseDate", F.MobileFormYN AS "MobileFormYN" FROM jwf_store_forms F INNER JOIN sys_store_items I ON F.StoreItemID = I.StoreItemID INNER JOIN jwf_store_formscategory C ON F.CategoryID = C.CategoryID INNER JOIN jwf_store_forms_rev R ON F.StoredFormID = R.StoredFormID LEFT OUTER JOIN ( SELECT B.StoredFormID, A.StoredFormRevID, A.CompanyCode, A.PurchaseDate FROM jwf_store_purchase A INNER JOIN jwf_store_forms_rev B ON A.StoredFormRevID = B.StoredFormRevID WHERE A.CompanyCode = #{CompanyCode} ) P ON F.StoredFormID = P.StoredFormID WHERE R.StoredFormRevID = #{StoredFormRevID}

INSERT INTO jwf_formsschema( SchemaName ,SchemaDesc ,SchemaContext ,DomainID ) SELECT Fn_BaseGetDictionary_S(#{lang}, #{FormName}) ,' ' ,SchemaContext ,(SELECT DomainID FROM sys_object_domain sod WHERE DomainCode = #{CompanyCode}) FROM jwf_formsschema WHERE SchemaID = ( SELECT SchemaID FROM jwf_forms jf WHERE FormPrefix = 'CSTF_STANDARD_' || #{StoredFormSchema} || '_FORM' ) AND ROWNUM = 1
SELECT JWF_FORMSSCHEMA_SEQ.CURRVAL FROM dual
